commits.message: feat(docs): COD-20 - implement new features across 5 components

ai.title: feat: Significantly expand code coverage and documentation
ai.body:
This PR significantly expands the code coverage and documentation.  The changes include:

* Addition of numerous new `.codescribe/history/*.json` files indicating a substantial increase in test data.
* Updates to `linear_agent.js`, suggesting improvements or bug fixes in the linear agent's logic.  The exact nature of changes requires reviewing the diff.
* Modifications to `docs/PLUGIN_DEVELOPMENT.md`, enhancing the plugin development documentation.  Refer to the diff for specific details.
* Update to `.codescribe/logs/codescribe.log` reflecting the execution of the added tests. 

This commit introduces a large number of additions (5664 lines) which suggests significant enhancements to both the test suite and the core functionality. A thorough review is recommended before merging.
ai.summary: This PR significantly expands code coverage and documentation, adding many new tests and improving the linear agent and documentation.

• WorkflowAutomation

### API Interaction Flow

```
DB → >-API: Return Data

App → >-Client: Return Result

App → >-Client: Return Result

```
